dialogue.introduction: We've finally met! I'm Kagerou. Treat me well!
dialogue.library_intro: Constucted for the Circle-4 programe, Kagerou-class nameship, Kagerou. As the main power of the newly-made ships, staring off with the Hawaii attack force, I was in lots of varied battles! Treat me well!
dialogue.secretary3: I'll get angry if you touch me too much, you know?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Commander, are you listening? Commander? Oh, come on, Commander! What's the big idea, ignoring me?!
dialogue.secretarymarried: Commander... You've really been doing your best, haven't you? Yeah. I have do my best too, alongside you.
dialogue.wedding: Ah, Commander! Great work!... Erm, right.. Um, here's a Hawaiian souvenir chocolate for you!
dialogue.show_players_score: A telegram for the commander has arrived.
dialogue.equipment2: Oh? This is pretty good! Thanks.
dialogue.equipment3: Thanks! Expect great things from me!
dialogue.expedition_selection: Thanks! Expect great things from me!
dialogue.resource_collection: Thanks! Expect great things from me!
dialogue.instant_repair: Thanks! Expect great things from me!
dialogue.development: Thanks! Expect great things from me!
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: I'll be away for a bit. *sigh*.
dialogue.docking_complete: Looks like a new friend has just finished repairs.
dialogue.start_a_sortie: Both turbines to full speed, Kagerou sortieing!
dialogue.battle_start: Enemy Fleet discovered! I'm going in! Stick with Kagerou!
dialogue.night_attack: How bad for you, take this!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: How bad for you, take this!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: How bad for you, take this!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: How bad for you, take this!
dialogue.mvp: How was it, my fighting? A text-book case? Ah, thanking me is enough.
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Hmmph, it'll take more than that!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: I'm not worth of the position of the Kagerou nameship... *sigh*
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Isn't today a important day? Command, everyone, congrats!
dialogue.early_summer_2015: Shiranui~! You, too, should buy a new swimsuit this year. Eh? Aah, sheesh! I'll choose for you!
dialogue.midsummer_2015: Hey! We're going to sea with the 18th Des Div's members. Are you all properly wearing swimsuits under your clothes? Shiranui, this goes for you too!
dialogue.christmas_2015: It's Christmas, we need to enjoy ourselves! Is everyone eating? Oh, Shiranui looks surprisingly happy, doesn't she?
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: It's already New Year's Eve, it really came too fast. I should also finish up fast with cleaning. Eh? New Year's Food? Yeah.
dialogue.new_year_2016: Admiral, Happy New Year! Please take care of me and the 18th Destroyer Division this year, too!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: So it's Setsubun... Oh well. Okay, it's time to throw! Whoa, Shiranui! What are you doing?
